name: Viva Hell Vegas
description:
Deep within the realms of debts, you get your hands shit deep as you adventure into a procedural casino to hunt down all the deamon debt collectors, the money you owe is money you'll win! Gamble your life to recover your soul from the devil.
So just... one... more roll of the dice, whatdoya' say? Get luck or die trying.

Controls:

WASD to Move
Space to Jump
Left Click to Roll the Dice
Esc for Windows Size

Credits:
  • Augusto Tuttolomondo: Game Design / 3D Modeling
  • Fela: Game Design / Music & Sound / Coding
  • Bruno Menzela & Valen Hazzi: 2D Art

All content was made in 48 hours for the GTMK Game Jam 2022.
